newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: India issues additional Oct kerosene buy tender.
newsitem.headline: India issues additional Oct kerosene buy tender.

text.p: State-owned Indian Oil Corp (IOC) has issued a tender to buy an additional cargo of superior kerosene for delivery in October, traders said on Thursday.
The tender requests delivery of one 45,000-tonne cargo to Madras or Haldia on October 1-5.
This tender is an addition to an earlier one issued by IOC for the delivery of 30,000-tonne cargoes to Bombay and 45,000-tonne cargoes to Madras or Haldia in October.
Both tenders close on September 5 and offers should be valid until September 6.
Traders said IOC may have issued the additional tender because it specifically needs a cargo for delivery on the dates requested.
IOC cancelled its two tenders for August and September deliveries.
